Articles.Content:
Hi there!

I have a question regarding the profile edit settings. In basic info, it says I can enter a Member Title. What is the member title? Is it the words beneath your main username? Also, when we enter it already, can we change it afterwards?

I also have a question regarding the cover photo and the profile picture. Are there recommended sizes? If so, can someone tell me what the recommended sizes for both of them are?

Thanks!

1 hour ago, AeroSky said:

Hi there!

I have a question regarding the profile edit settings. In basic info, it says I can enter a Member Title. What is the member title? Is it the words beneath your main username? Also, when we enter it already, can we change it afterwards?

I also have a question regarding the cover photo and the profile picture. Are there recommended sizes? If so, can someone tell me what the recommended sizes for both of them are?

Thanks!

Member title is the text right under your name on the left. Yes, you can change it. 

I don't actually know about the pic sizes because we just had a software update. Pretty small for the avatar and pretty big for the profile pic. 

But you might need to post a few more times before the software agrees you are not a spambot. 

Meanwhile, welcome to the forum.

Thanks for the help!

Also, I'm guessing we can change the other things like the location, profile picture, cover photo, etc. multiple times, right?

 

 

Edited November 5, 2020 by AeroSky

7 hours ago, AeroSky said:

Thanks for the help!

Also, I'm guessing we can change the other things like the location, profile picture, cover photo, etc. multiple times, right?

 

 

Yep.

Alright!

Thanks for the warm welcome and the great help!
